llg_terms Package¶

llg_terms Package¶

This module contains all binding to c++ classes and bindings connected to dolfin

class magnumfe.llg_terms.LLGTerm¶

Bases: object

form_term(state, w)¶
class magnumfe.llg_terms.DemagField(sample_size, order=1)¶

Bases: magnumfe.llg_terms.llg_term.LLGTerm

This class defines methods for the micromagnetic stray-field computation. It uses cuboid transformation techniques of arbitrary order.

calculate_potential(state)¶

Calculate the stray-field for a given simulation state

Arguments
state
The simulation state
static create_mesh(*args, **kwargs)¶

Creates a WrappedMesh suited for the application of the shell- transformation method. Either takes a filename as first argument to load the meshed sample or sizes and discretization of a cuboid sample.

Example

Arguments
d
Number of shell layers.
scale
Scale factor used for mesh generation.
margin
Margin to the sample when loading sample mesh from a file.
n
Discretization of inner cuboid when loading sample mesh from a file.
form_term(state, w)¶
class magnumfe.llg_terms.ExternalField(field=Coefficient(VectorElement('Real', None, 0, dim=3, quad_scheme=None), 0))¶

Bases: magnumfe.llg_terms.llg_term.LLGTerm

This class represents a constant external field.

form_term(state, w)¶
set(field)¶
class magnumfe.llg_terms.DemagFieldFK¶

Bases: magnumfe.llg_terms.llg_term.LLGTerm

This class defines methods for the micromagnetic stray-field computation. It uses the FEM-BEM coupling as proposed by Fredkin and Koehler.

demag_field Module¶

This module defines a class for the micromagnetic stray-field computation using transformation techniques.

static create_mesh(*args, **kwargs)¶

Creates a WrappedMesh suited for the application of the shell- transformation method. Either takes a filename as first argument to load the meshed sample or sizes and discretization of a cuboid sample.

Example

Arguments
d
Number of shell layers.
scale
Scale factor used for mesh generation.
margin
Margin to the sample when loading sample mesh from a file.
n
Discretization of inner cuboid when loading sample mesh from a file.

demag_field_fk Module¶

This module defines a class for the micromagnetic stray-field computation using the FEM-BEM coupling as proposed by Fredkin and Koehler.

spin_current Module¶

This module defines a class for the coupling of a spin polarized current with the magnetization
